column4: hey BluesKaj, I tried updating and upgrading apt-get and then tried aptg-get install nvidia-current, but it says I'm already using the newest version...
you have ubuntu normal repo or another one?
I remember adding other repositories to install gtk+3
I use ubunt-x-swat it usually has the last version
this is where I got the repository for the gtk+3. Can that repository screw all my system? Should I remove the repositories? How can I do that?
everytime I launch ubuntu it sends me to console tty... X is not launched
before that I get (EE) No drivers available
yes, in Xorg output, after doing startx
should I move xorg.conf to where?
I dont have that file in that path... :(
got this error: "FATAL: Module nvidia not found"
I just installed as you said, and also tried to startx, and it seems it worked, but it didnt show me the login window... Instead of that, it opened a terminal window, but now I can see the mouse
